name: Button
description: A versatile button component with multiple variants and sizes.

name: CopyButton
description: A button with copy-to-clipboard functionality and visual feedback animation.

name: FlipButton
description: A button with 3D flip animation effect on hover with customizable directions.

name: GitHubStarsButton
description: A button that displays real GitHub repository star count with animated counter. Fetches data from GitHub API.

name: IconButton
description: A circular button with icons featuring interactive effects and customizable colors.

name: InputButton
description: A compound component that transforms between button and input field with smooth animations.

name: LiquidButton
description: A button with liquid-like fill animation effect on hover.

name: RippleButton
description: A button with ripple click effect that emanates from the click point.

name: MagneticButton
description: A button with magnetic attraction effect that follows mouse movement within range.

name: LiquidGlassButton
description: Interactive glass morphism button with backdrop blur and realistic lighting effects.

name: SlidingNumber
description: An animated number component with smooth sliding transitions between values.

name: CountingNumber
description: Animated number counter with smooth spring transitions and customizable formatting.

name: GradientText
description: Animated gradient text with customizable colors and optional neon glow effect.

name: HighlightText
description: Text with animated highlight background that expands on view.

name: RollingText
description: 3D rolling animation effect with perspective transforms.

name: RotatingText
description: Cycles through multiple text options with smooth transitions.

name: SplittingText
description: Text animation that splits by characters, words, or lines with staggered effects.

name: TypingText
description: Typewriter effect with optional cursor and support for multiple text sequences.

name: WritingText
description: Word-by-word animation with spring transitions and customizable spacing.

name: AvatarGroup
description: Display a collection of avatars in an overlapping group layout with hover animations and tooltips.

name: CodeEditor
description: An animated code editor with syntax highlighting, typing animation, and copy functionality.

name: ManagementBar
description: An interactive management bar with pagination, action buttons, and smooth animations. Perfect for data management interfaces.

name: PlayfulTodolist
description: A fun and interactive todo list with animated strikethrough effects using SVG paths and smooth animations.

name: MotionGrid
description: An animated grid component that cycles through different patterns with smooth transitions. Perfect for loading states or decorative animations.

gridSize.description: Tuple of [cols, rows] for grid dimensions

frames.description: Array of coordinate arrays representing animation frames

name: PinList
description: An interactive list component where items can be pinned/unpinned with smooth layout animations and proper z-index management.

items.description: Array of PinListItem objects with id, name, info, icon, and pinned properties

example: <PinList items={[{id: 1, name: 'Item', info: 'Description', icon: HomeIcon, pinned: false}]} />

name: ScrollProgress
description: A scroll progress indicator that shows reading progress with smooth spring animations. Works for both window scroll and container scroll.

progressProps.description: Props passed to the progress bar motion.div

name: SpringElement
description: A draggable element connected with an animated spring path that follows the drag motion with realistic spring physics.

springPathConfig.description: Configuration for spring path generation including coilCount, amplitude, etc.

name: StarsScrollingWheel
description: An animated counter with scrolling wheel effect that features star animations and particle effects when reaching the target value.

stars.description: Target number to count up to

name: CodeTabs
description: A tabbed code viewer with syntax highlighting, copy functionality, and theme support for displaying multiple code snippets.
example: <CodeTabs codes={{ npm: 'npm install', yarn: 'yarn add' }} lang="bash" copyButton={true} />

name: Counter
description: An interactive counter component with animated increment/decrement buttons and sliding number transitions.

name: Cursor
description: Custom cursor effects with provider context, smooth animations, and follow behaviors for enhanced user interactions.

name: Files
description: A file explorer component with expandable folders, file icons, and smooth animations for displaying file structures.

name: Icon
description: A comprehensive icon animation system with hover, tap, and custom animation support. Provides animated icon wrappers with Motion.js integration.
export: AnimateIcon, IconWrapper, useAnimateIconContext, getVariants, pathClassName, staticAnimations

name: DropdownMenu
description: A menu component with animated highlights and comprehensive item types including checkboxes, radio groups, and submenus.
export: DropdownMenu, DropdownMenuTrigger, DropdownMenuContent, DropdownMenuItem, DropdownMenuLabel, DropdownMenuSeparator, DropdownMenuCheckboxItem, DropdownMenuRadioGroup, DropdownMenuRadioItem, DropdownMenuShortcut, DropdownMenuSub, DropdownMenuSubContent, DropdownMenuSubTrigger, DropdownMenuGroup, DropdownMenuPortal

name: HoverCard
description: A card that appears on hover with smooth animations and customizable content positioning.

name: Dialog
description: Modal dialog with 3D flip animations and customizable entry directions.
export: Dialog, DialogTrigger, DialogContent, DialogHeader, DialogTitle, DialogDescription, DialogFooter, DialogClose, DialogPortal, DialogOverlay

name: Collapsible
description: Expandable content area with smooth height animations and spring transitions.

name: Checkbox
description: Animated checkbox with smooth check mark drawing and hover effects.

name: Accordion
description: Collapsible content sections with smooth animations and rotating chevron indicators.

name: Tooltip
description: A flexible tooltip system with animations, positioning, and global state management.

name: Input
description: Styled input field with focus states, validation styling, and file upload support.

name: Label
description: Accessible label component with proper form association and disabled states.

name: Progress
description: Animated progress bar with smooth spring transitions and customizable styling.

name: RadioGroup
description: Animated radio button group with smooth scaling effects and proper accessibility.

name: Separator
description: Visual separator element for dividing content with horizontal and vertical orientations.

name: Skeleton
description: Loading placeholder with pulse animation for better perceived performance.

name: Popover
description: Floating content container with smooth animations and customizable positioning.

name: Sheet
description: Slide-out panel with smooth animations and multiple entry directions.
export: Sheet, SheetTrigger, SheetContent, SheetHeader, SheetTitle, SheetDescription, SheetFooter, SheetClose

name: Sidebar
description: Collapsible navigation sidebar with responsive behavior and keyboard shortcuts.
export: SidebarProvider, Sidebar, SidebarTrigger, SidebarContent, SidebarHeader, SidebarFooter, SidebarGroup, SidebarGroupLabel, SidebarGroupContent, SidebarMenu, SidebarMenuItem, SidebarMenuButton, SidebarInset

name: MotionHighlight
description: Animated highlight system for creating smooth transitions between active states with customizable modes and behaviors.

name: Switch
description: Animated toggle switch with smooth transitions, optional icons, and customizable thumb interactions.

name: Tabs
description: Animated tab navigation with smooth transitions, motion highlights, and dynamic content sizing.

name: ToggleGroup
description: Toggle button group with single/multiple selection modes, animated highlights, and customizable variants.

name: StarsBackground
description: An animated starfield background with multiple layers of stars moving at different speeds. Features mouse parallax interaction and customizable colors.

name: GradientBackground
description: A smooth animated gradient background that cycles through different positions creating a flowing color effect.

name: BubbleBackground
description: An interactive bubble background with floating orbs that respond to mouse movement and create organic flowing animations.

name: HexagonBackground
description: A geometric hexagon pattern background with hover effects and responsive grid layout that adapts to screen size.

name: FireworksBackground
description: An animated fireworks display with particle explosions, trails, and click interaction for launching custom fireworks.

color.description: Single color or array of colors for fireworks

name: HoleBackground
description: A mesmerizing tunnel effect with radiating lines and floating particles creating a depth illusion and hypnotic animation.
example: Content over tunnel effect
